results.title: The Storm riders = Fung Wan: Hungba Tinha
results.creator_credit: Golden Harvest, Centro Digital, Li Zhu An, Manfred Wong and Andrew Lau
results.brief_description: A martial arts fantasy film adapted from the long-running manga comic. The Lord Conqueror orphans two children, Wind and Cloud, then brings them up as his disciples. Ten years later the two are set against each other as they rival for the affections of Charity, the Lord Conqueror’s daughter. In Cantonese with English subtitles. Cast includes: Aaron Kwok, Ekin Cheng, Sonny Chiba, Kristy Yang and Shu Oi.

results.title: The Storage battery: maintenance
results.brief_description: The life of a storage battery is determined not only by the conditions under which it is used but also by the amount of care and maintenance given it.
results.description: The life of a storage battery is determined not only by the conditions under which it is used but also by the amount of care and maintenance given it.
description_for_label: The life of a storage battery is determined not only by the conditions under which it is used but also by the amount of care and maintenance given it.

results.title: The Storage battery: battery recharging
results.brief_description: Shows the types of equipment employed to recharge storage batteries: valve rectifier chargers, the more efficient metal rectifier chargers, trickle chargers to keep batteries in storage fully charged, and fast chargers such as are used at motor service stations. Demonstrates correct procedure to be observed before charging: thorough washing of cell covers and cleaning of terminals; adjustment of electrolyte level; checking polarity of battery and charger terminals; and if more than one battery is to be charged, connection in series.
results.description: Shows the types of equipment employed to recharge storage batteries: valve rectifier chargers, the more efficient metal rectifier chargers, trickle chargers to keep batteries in storage fully charged, and fast chargers such as are used at motor service stations. results.title: The Stones of Glasgow
results.creator_credit: University of Glasgow. Audio Visual Services and Michael Rigg
results.brief_description: Summarises the theories of 19th century architect Alexander Thomson, who designed many of Glasgow’s Victorian era structures - structures now being demolished in the name of progress. An actor playing Thomson quotes his theories of the need for eclecticism in architecture - he himself melded together classical Greek and ancient Egyptian styles, among others. We see footage of such Thomson designed buildings as the Caledonia Road Church (1856) and the St Vincent’s Road Church (1858).
results.creator_credit_for_label: University of Glasgow. Audio Visual Services and Michael Rigg

results.title: The Stones in the park
results.brief_description: The phenomenon of the rock concert is explored in this film of the Rolling Stones concert in Hyde Park, London 1969, a few days after the death Brian Jones. Includes interviews and behind-the-scenes footage. Photographed by Bill Brayne, Michael Dudds and Brian Grainger.

results.title: The Stonecutter
results.brief_description: Uses original graphics and music to recount an ancient Japanese tale of envy and greed - the story of Tasaku, the stonecutter, who is granted his wishes to become a prince, the sun, a cloud, and finally a gigantic mountain. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
results.description: Uses original graphics and music to recount an ancient Japanese tale of envy and greed - the story of Tasaku, the stonecutter, who is granted his wishes to become a prince, the sun, a cloud, and finally a gigantic mountain. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.

results.title: The Stolen children = Il Ladro di bambini
results.creator_credit: Angelo Rizzoli, Erre Produzioni, Alia Film, Raidue and Gianni Amelio
results.brief_description: Two children, Rosetta and Giusseppe are victims of a child prostitution ring. After their mother is arrested, they are taken by Antonio the Carabiniere from the North to the South of Italy, looking for an orphanage that will take the children. The children have learned to trust no-one, not even each other, yet this journey with Antonio begins to break down the barriers that the children have always had to maintain. This very special, rewarding film was the winner of the Grand Jury Prize at the 1992 Cannes Film Festival and has been universally hailed as one of the finest Italian films released in many years. Stars Enrico Lo Verso, Valentina Scalici and Giuseppe Ieracitano.

results.title: The Sting [DVD]
results.creator_credit: Universal Pictures, Tony Bill, Michael S Phillips, Julia Phillips and George Roy Hill
results.brief_description: Johnny Hooker (Robert Redford) is a small time con-man working the backstreets of 1930s Chicago. When his partner is killed by mob boss Doyle Lonnegan, he teams up with down-and-out career criminal Henry Gondorff (Paul Newman), to dupe Lonnegan out of more than half a million dollars. The definitive ‘caper’ movie, “The Sting” features legendary ragtime piano by Scott Joplin and a superb supporting cast including Charles Durning, Eileen Brennan and Robert Shaw.
